attributes.action: Establish recall referenda for sitting MPs
attributes.additional_details: A five year parliamentary term is not a blank cheque. The links between MPs and constituents needs to be improved. MPs need to play a more effective role in articulating the concerns of their constituents. The right to recall a sitting MP will enable a modicum of democracy to be re-injected into British politics
attributes.background: Parliament has consistently failed to respond to demands for a more proportional voting system. This has led to skewed election results and artifical majorities. The current Tory 80 seat majority is an impediment to effective oversight of parliament at a time of dramatic change.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548400
